text:
Hi Guys, disclaimer. I am not a developer but our developer does need some help. We have an iframe form used to capture registration on our website (with HubSpot tracking code on both). Unfortunately we are not getting any Web Analytics on submissions just - Offline Source / API. Here is a video : <https://www.loom.com/share/5b01b0572b684c3381a48dcee935b1cc>.

Interested in working with any consultants who can help us with a fix.

How to get phone number using contact API
response not getting phone number
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
*GET*`/crm/v3/objects/contacts/{contactId}`

```{"id":"751","properties":{"createdate":"2022-06-13T07:56:58.368Z","email":null,"firstname":"3475460762","hs_object_id":"751","lastmodifieddate":"2022-06-13T07:57:14.554Z","lastname":null},"createdAt":"2022-06-13T07:56:58.368Z","updatedAt":"2022-06-13T07:57:14.554Z","archived":false}```
Does anyone know if Private Apps require you to make a Developer account?
Hello! does anyone know if it's possible to receive HubSpot pageview events using a webhook?

No, but you must be a super admin in the HubSpot account to set a private app:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/private-apps>
Hi all. We believe we've found a bug in the API – who do we get in touch with regarding this?
Are you the HubSpot team in this slack? Or is this community only?

I have reached out to the in-app support before for API bugs and they solved them after a few days. The people I talked with had a basic level of API knowledge but they escalated the issue to the tech team
You need Ops Hub to be able to send webhooks via workflows.
I have a piece of Python code that loops through all pages, let me know if that would be helpful
You can add a test value to see on the right panel how the request should be structured. You need to use internal names for the property.

Hello all, I am curious about how can we call an API endpoint in the template HTML/JS file, generated using HubSpot private apps? Any way to embed curl or php code in template file?

Thank you!
